flawed_nl_solution:
There are 22 pieces of pizza because 14 plus 8 equals <<14+8=22>>22.
They have eaten 14 pieces of pizza because 9 plus 9 equals <<9+9=14>>14.
There are 8 pieces of pizza left because 22 minus 14 equals <<22-14=8>>8.
There are 4 pieces per person because 8 divided by 2 equals <<8/2=4>>4.
